trans-unit.source: Provides <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement" /> objects for each state and direction of a scroll arrow.
trans-unit.target: 根據捲動箭號的每個狀態和方向提供 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: Each property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ScrollBar.ArrowButton> class returns a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> for a different state and direction of a scroll arrow.
trans-unit.target: 每一個屬性的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ScrollBar.ArrowButton>類別會傳回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement>不同的狀態和方向的捲動箭號。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ScrollBar.ArrowButton.UpNormal%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>與<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement>傳回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ScrollBar.ArrowButton.UpNormal%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行這個範例，請將其貼入 Windows Form 中。

trans-unit.source: Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElementScrollBarArrowButton1` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 處理表單的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件和呼叫`DrawVisualStyleElementScrollBarArrowButton1`方法從<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件處理方法，傳遞`e`為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a visual style element that represents a downward-pointing scroll arrow in the disabled state.
trans-unit.target: 取得視覺化樣式項目，表示處於停用狀態的下指 (Downward-Pointing) 捲動箭號。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement" /> that represents a downward-pointing scroll arrow in the disabled state.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement" />，表示處於停用狀態的下指捲動箭號。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ScrollBar.ArrowButton.DownDisabled%2A> property to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement>傳回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ScrollBar.ArrowButton.DownDisabled%2A>屬性以建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>。

trans-unit.target: 若要執行這個範例，請將其貼入 Windows Form 中。
